Posts.Content: I have Prostate cancer. I was diagnosed at 48. I had radiation therapy, hormone therapy and lots of issues since my treatment. My PSA was never super high and the reason I had it checked was I am the third generation to have prostate cancer and each generation it has gotten younger and more aggressive. I have had to have my spinchter removed , several cysto's, I have had severe clotting, and the inability to void. I currently am on my second artificial spinchter with two resrviors. This has helped with the level of incontinence. However, I am now ashamed to say, I cannot have sex with my wife with out voiding in her. She is very careful in her words and never complains... but for me, I am just mortified that I pee every time. Does anyone have suggestions or has anyone else's had this issue?
Posts.Title: Need to see if this is normal or if someone has advice on it

Posts.Content: Thank you! This is just such a weird thing to deal with. I always hated condoms and thought of trying them for this.... however just was hoping a better solution is available.
Posts.Title: Need to see if this is normal or if someone has advice on it

Posts.Content: It actually is the same thing. I can go and totally empty my bladder prior to sex, but, the same thing happens. I have a follow up with my urologist next mo th and will address this. Thanks for the welcome! It is good to see others have been through similar things and we have a commonality.
